content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The target structure consists of 10 building blocks arranged in multiple layers:
- Base layer: 1 green rectangular block (foundation)
- Second layer: 1 orange cylindrical block
- Third layer: 2 yellow horizontal rectangular blocks and 3 green blocks forming a frame
- Fourth layer: 1 orange triangular prism inside the frame
- Fifth layer: 1 green horizontal rectangular block
- Top layer: 1 blue cubic block

## Spatial Relationships
- The structure starts with a green horizontal rectangular block as the base
- An orange vertical cylinder sits on top of the base block
- Two vertical green rectangular blocks form the sides of a frame
- A green rectangular block forms the back of the frame
- Two yellow horizontal rectangular blocks connect the sides at the top and bottom of the frame
- An orange triangular prism sits inside the frame at the bottom
- A green horizontal rectangular block sits on top of the frame
- A blue cube sits at the very top of the structure

# Selection of Required Blocks from Dictionary

Based on my analysis, I need the following blocks:

1. Base: Green horizontal rectangular block - Block index 4
2. Cylinder: Orange vertical cylinder - Block index 11
3. Frame sides: Green vertical rectangular blocks (2) - Block index 5 (used twice)
4. Frame back: Green rectangular block - Block index 6
5. Frame connectors: Yellow horizontal rectangular blocks (2) - Block index 8 (used twice)
6. Inside prism: Orange triangular prism - Block index 14
7. Upper horizontal block: Green horizontal rectangular block - Block index 3
8. Top cube: Blue cube - Block index 1

# Assembly Order

```
{
  Step1: Move block with index 4
  Step2: Move block with index 11
  Step3: Move block with index 5
  Step4: Move block with index 5
  Step5: Move block with index 6
  Step6: Move block with index 8
  Step7: Move block with index 8
  Step8: Move block with index 14
  Step9: Move block with index 3
  Step10: Move block with index 1
}
```
